title: The Childhood of Joseph Stalin
itunes:title: The Childhood of Joseph Stalin
description:
Robert is joined by Cody Johnston to discuss the childhood of Stalin.


FOOTNOTES:

  1. Stalin as a Theological Student
  2. The Finnish City Where Lenin Met Stalin Still Lives in Russia's Shadow
  3. On the Origin and Significance of the Name "Stalin"
  4. Stalin, from Child to Bolshevik Leader
  5. HOW STALIN BECAME STALINIST
  6. Stalin: Paradoxes of Power, 1878-1928 
  7. Young Stalin

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
